description: An advanced dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB exporter to track and watch requests with their status codes and latencies.

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "checks" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "check", "group"
SELECT sum("value") as "Success Count", count("value") as Total FROM "checks" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "endpoint", "group", "status"

SELECT percentile("value", 95), percentile("value", 99), max("value"), median("value"), stddev("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE ("status" = '202' OR "status" = '200' OR "status" = '204') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT min("value") FROM $Measurement WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0
SELECT max("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT percentile("value", 90) FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("value") FROM /^$Measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter and value > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

title: Exa Advanced k6 Dashboard
